00032 /* used to check wether there is enough space on the SE */
00033 #define GFAL_NEWFILE_SIZE         1024
00034 
00035 #define GFAL_OPEN_MAX             1024
00036 #define GFAL_DEFAULT_CATALOG_TYPE "lfc"
00037 #define GFAL_FQAN_MAX             64
00038 #define GFAL_GUID_LEN             37
00039 #define GFAL_VO_MAXLEN            255
00040 #define GFAL_FQAN_MAXLEN          511

00043 #define GFAL_ERRMSG_LEN           1024

00045 #define GFAL_SIZE_MARGIN          1048576     // 1MB
00046 #define GFAL_SRM_MAXRETRIES       10
00047

00049 #define GFAL_ERRLEVEL_ERROR       0
00050 #define GFAL_ERRLEVEL_WARN        1
00051 #define GFAL_ERRLEVEL_INFO        2
00052

00054 #define GFAL_VERBOSE_NORMAL       0    
00055 #define GFAL_VERBOSE_VERBOSE      1
